details.brokersummary: 2br duplex with basement for additional storage! Shared courtyard Hardwood floors Modern renovations Amazing location If you need a lot of space, this is the one. See video. Note additional toilet in the downstairs bathroom has been capped off to avoid any flooding issues. No fee pets ok Call or text to see right away

Lovely two bedroom apartment located in the heart of Bushwick. The apartment features hardwood floors throughout and a renovated kitchen with stainless steal appliances and butcher block bar/island. The large bedrooms have plenty of natural light to start your morning off right. The building is pet friendly and has laundry facility in the basement so no need to haul those heavy laundry bags. Great location just one block from Maria Hernandez Park, Jefferson L train stop and surrounded by popular taverns and cafes. No fee!

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building ($300/mo)- Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

Live next to the action in this 2 bedroom apartment located in prime downtown Bushwick! Stunning unit in a very convenient location and borderline East Williamsburg. Only 1 block away from the L Jefferson for a reduced commute, and next to Bushwick?s popular restaurants: Cafe Ghia, Bunna Cafe, Mominette Bistro! Laundry in building for your convenience & pet friendly building too!
Butcher block island separates kitchen from living room. See Video! (if you can?t see it check streeteasy or message and I?ll send it) These are 2 king sized bedrooms on opposite sides of the apartment with large closets! Amazing skyline views from the roof as well Just 1st and security to move in No fee
Message to see this right away!

Gorgeous 2BR/1BA in prime Bushwick. Large bedrooms on opposite end of the apartment Cutout window from front bedroom bringing light into living room as well as window in living room. Laundry in the building . Steps from both the L and M trains
See video on StreetEasy or send message and I?ll text it to you
Hardwood floors Renovated kitchen and bath Stainless steel appliances. Laundry in the building Less than a 5 minute walk from the BOTH the L and M train. Right in the center of Bushwick steps away from all you favorite local spots!
NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in Pets ok
Call to take a look today!

Brand new 2.5 room / 1 bath with central air! Tons of light and high ceilings in this unit. Just one block from Myrtle/Wyckoff L/M stop! Laundry in the basement, LATCH smartlocks on all doors in the building!
This has been used as a 3br in the past but owners have dropped the price and advertising as a 2br. The 3br room has french doors that open to the living room area.
Please call or text to take a look today!

Huge 2br with window in every room including the living room and eat in kitchen! Tired of looking at tiny 2brs? This could be the one for you. Pre-war original details. Spacious and sunny
Huge separate living room with light coming from all sides so you have windows in all rooms. Large eat in kitchen with another window Huge king sized bedrooms on opposite sides of the apartment for maximum privacy Hardwood floors Renovated kitchen and bath Stainless steel appliances
Heat and hot water included!
1 block to the Halsey stop of the L train!
No fee Pets ok Call or text to view right away!

The large bedrooms have plenty of natural light to start your morning off right. The building is pet friendly and has laundry facility in the basement so no need to haul those heavy laundry bags. Beautiful 2BR/1bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedrooms . You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only few blocks from the L train, and a 8 minute walk to the J,M trains

Bright & Modern Apartment in a Charming Stuyvesant Heights Block ? Just Minutes to Manhattan!
Welcome to your new home in one of Brooklyn's most desirable neighborhoods! This beautifully updated apartment blends classic charm with modern conveniences, offering a stylish living space on a serene, tree-lined street in Stuyvesant Heights. Perfectly situated just minutes from Manhattan, this apartment boasts:
Exposed Brick: Adding character and warmth to your living space. High Ceilings: Creating a spacious and airy atmosphere. Hardwood Floors: Elegant, durable, and timeless. Video Intercom: Added peace of mind and security. Natural Light in the Living Area: Sun-drenched, bright, and welcoming. Eat-In Kitchen: Perfect for meals and gatherings with a view. Stainless Steel Appliances: Sleek, modern, and ready for your culinary adventures. Dishwasher: For effortless clean-up after meals. Gas Stove: Ideal for cooking enthusiasts. Central Air: Stay comfortable year-round, no matter the weather. Stone Countertops: Stylish and easy to maintain. Convenient Location:
Minutes from public transportation, including Utica Av (A, C) and Gates Av (J) subway stations, making your commute a breeze. Don?t miss out on the opportunity to live in this vibrant neighborhood, with a unique mix of history, culture, and modern amenities right outside your door. Schedule a showing today!

Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

This Ridgewood neighborhood backs right up to Bushwick, serving as it's older and wiser sibling. You can enjoy all of the same delicious cuisine, fair trade hot (and necessary) coffee, unique locally owned businesses, bodegas and grocers, and centralized transportation as it's neighboring Brooklyn areas.
Experience that side of life while also keeping that lovely community feel of the slightly more residential and peaceful Queens existence. You can have it both ways! Now top that all off with the fact this quiet building only has 6 units!! *long exhale* now that's the right choice.
Conveniently located off the M and L trains, as well as the B13, B20, B38, and Q39, and Q58 bus lines.
Pet Friendly First & Security NO FEE

Elevated Living at 527 Grand Ave in Prospect Heights
Welcome to 527 Grand Ave, a luxury community perfectly nestled in the vibrant Prospect Heights neighborhood. Offering 1 and 2 bedroom residences with spacious layouts, premium finishes, and thoughtful design, this property redefines modern living. Tons of natural sunlight throughout.
Residents enjoy unparalleled amenities, including: - A state-of-the-art fitness center - Expansive rooftop terrace with stunning skyline views - Dedicated children?s playroom - Business conference room for remote work and meetings - Convenient elevator access
Neighborhood Highlights: Prospect Heights is a blend of historic charm and contemporary culture. Stroll down tree-lined streets to uncover trendy restaurants, cozy cafes, and boutique shops. The iconic Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and Brooklyn Museum are just steps away, offering lush green spaces and endless cultural experiences. Excellent transit options, including the A and C trains, make commuting to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn a breeze.

Introducing 242 Newkirk, located in Kensington, right off the historical Ocean Parkway. 242 Newkirk is a brand new luxury building offering 44 rental units.
All units feature oversized windows, high-end modern appliances, gorgeous hardwood floors, and tasteful finishes throughout. Select units provide spacious balconies, patios, or private backyard spaces.
Amenities include a furnished roof deck, gym, elevator, laundry room, and bike storage.
Ideally located on Newkirk Avenue just off Ocean Parkway, you will have easy access to the B and Q trains at Newkirk Plaza as well as the F train at 18th Avenue. Prospect Park is just a 10 minute bike ride away.
Welcome home.
